text: Demitri fear - one of Ukraine's most
powerful and wealthy oligarchs showed me
the spot where he was arrested during a
business trip to Vienna in March the
Austrian police acting on behalf of the
FBI in the United States he posted a
record breaking bail of more than a
hundred and seventy million dollars to
get out of the police cell where he was
held for more than a week but he must
stay here in Austria until a court
decides if he should be extradited to
the United States to face charges of
alleged bribery and corruption the
industry the new job even though I'm
absolutely innocent I did not pay any
bribes and did not set up any organized
criminal groups I don't understand why
all this has happened to me but what is
important is there is a geopolitical
struggle between the United States and
Russia underway the United States needs
an enemy abroad to solve problems at
home and Ukraine happened to become a
battlefield leader a well-placed source
in the United States told the BBC mr.
faroush may indeed be a pawn in a bigger
game
the Americans wanting to get hold of him
partly because of his strong business
links with the elite in Russia about
whom he may have much sensitive
information how concerned are you that
you will eventually be extradited to the
United States next to Anika then is that
no one knows only god knows what will
happen I never thought I'd end up in
prison but we have a strong team of
lawyers and the United States
prosecutors will have to work very hard
to prove their case because the whole
case is fictional so now mr. fetish
waits to hear what his fate will be his
colleagues fear the Americans will lean
on the Austrian authorities to ensure he
is extradited to the United States where
he could come under pressure cold war
style to reveal all which a Gallup in
BBC News Vienna
